item.title: Switch 累计销量达 1.55 亿台，成任天堂史上最畅销主机
item.guid: Switch-累计销量达-1.55-亿台，成任天堂史上最畅销主机
item.description:
Yesterday, Nintendo released its Q3 financial report for the fiscal year ending March 2026, showing that Switch's global cumulative sales had reached 155.37 million units by the end of last year, officially surpassing the Nintendo DS to become Nintendo's best-selling game console in history. 昨天，任天堂发布 2026 年 3 月期第 3 季度财报，显示 Switch 的全球累计销量已在去年年底达到 1 亿 5537 万台，正式超越 Nintendo DS，成为任天堂历史上最畅销的游戏主机。

The financial report also disclosed that the annual active player base on the Switch platform has exceeded 100 million for two consecutive years. 财报同时披露，Switch 平台的年度活跃玩家规模连续两年超过 1 亿人。

The financial report indicates that while the Switch achieved a new historical high, the launch of Switch 2 further boosted overall performance growth. 财报显示，在 Switch 创下历史新高的同时，Switch 2 的上市进一步推动整体业绩增长。

    From April to December last year, Nintendo's consolidated revenue reached 1.9058 trillion yen (approximately 84.93 billion RMB), a year-on-year increase of 99.3%;

    Operating profit was 300.3 billion yen (approximately 13.4 billion RMB), a year-on-year increase of 21.3%;

    Quarterly net profit was 358.8 billion yen (approximately 16 billion RMB), a year-on-year increase of 51.3%.

In addition, the company stated that exchange rate fluctuations had a positive impact of approximately 17.5 billion yen (approximately 781 million RMB) at the operating profit stage. 此外，公司表示，汇率变动在营业利润阶段带来约 175 亿日元（约合人民币 7.81 亿元） 的正面影响。

    In terms of hardware, Switch 2 shipped 17.37 million units within half a year of its launch, becoming Nintendo's fastest-selling console to date, with software sales also reaching 37.93 million units;

    In contrast, Switch (including OLED and Lite) hardware sales dropped to 3.25 million units, a year-on-year decrease of 66%, but software sales still maintained a scale of 108.93 million units, only decreasing by 12.1%.

From the perspective of revenue structure: 从收入结构来看：

    The dedicated game console business contributed 1.8513 trillion yen (approximately 82.58 billion RMB), a year-on-year increase of 106.7%;

    IP-related revenue (film and television, licensing, smart devices, etc.) was 54.5 billion yen (approximately 2.43 billion RMB), a year-on-year decrease of 10.1%;

    Overseas markets remain the main source of growth, with overseas revenue accounting for 77.2% in the first three quarters;

    Digital business maintained stable growth, with digital sales reaching 282 billion yen (approximately 12.6 billion RMB), a year-on-year increase of 14.7%, accounting for 50.4% of software revenue;

    First-party software sales increased to 74.9%, reflecting Nintendo's continued advantage in its content ecosystem.

R&D and marketing investments significantly increased: 研发与市场投入显著增加：

    R&D expenses in the first three quarters reached 127.5 billion yen (approximately 5.68 billion RMB), a year-on-year increase of 21.8%;

    Advertising and promotional expenses reached 114.4 billion yen (approximately 5.10 billion RMB), a year-on-year increase of 66.2%, mainly used for Switch 2 promotion and content layout.

In terms of outlook, Nintendo maintains its previously announced full-year performance forecast: 预期方面，任天堂维持此前发布的全年业绩预期不变：

    Revenue for the current fiscal year is expected to reach 2.25 trillion yen (approximately 1 trillion RMB), a year-on-year increase of 93.1%;

    Operating profit is expected to be 370 billion yen (approximately 16.5 billion RMB), a year-on-year increase of 30.9%;

    Full-year Switch 2 hardware sales are expected to be 19 million units, and software sales are expected to be 48 million units;

    Switch hardware sales are expected to decrease to 4 million units, and software sales are expected to be 125 million units.

Regarding content, Nintendo announced release plans for several new Switch 2 titles, including 'Mario Tennis Fever' (February 12), 'Pokémon Pokopia' (March 5), 'Super Mario Bros. Wonder Switch 2 Edition' (March 26), and more. 内容方面，任天堂公布了多款 Switch 2 新作的发售计划，包括《马里奥网球 Fever》（2 月 12 日）、《宝可梦 Pokopia》（3 月 5 日）、《超级马里奥兄弟 Wonder Switch 2 Edition》（3 月 26 日）等。

The third-party lineup also includes titles such as 'Dynasty Warriors ORIGINS', 'Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade', and 'Dragon's Dogma Reimagined'. 第三方阵容也包括《真 · 三国无双 ORIGINS》《最终幻想 VII 重制版 Intergrade》《龙之信条 Reimagined》等作品。

Nintendo also updated on IP-related business progress, including Nintendo Live 2025 Tokyo held last October, the Nintendo FUKUOKA direct store opened in November, and the 'Super Mario Galaxy' movie project in collaboration with Illumination. 任天堂还更新了 IP 相关业务进展，包括去年 10 月举办的 Nintendo Live 2025 Tokyo、11 月开业的 Nintendo FUKUOKA 直营店，以及与 Illumination 合作的《超级马里奥银河》电影项目。

item.title: 曝小鹏合并智驾与座舱团队，成立通用智能中心
item.guid: 曝小鹏合并智驾与座舱团队，成立通用智能中心
item.description:
LatePost Auto, citing informed sources, reported that XPeng Motors recently completed a significant organizational restructuring, merging its original autonomous driving center and smart cockpit center to establish a new general intelligence center. 晚点 Auto 援引知情人士报道，小鹏汽车近日完成一项重要组织架构调整，将原自动驾驶中心与智能座舱中心合并，成立全新的通用智能中心。

The new department will be overseen by Liu Xianming, the former head of autonomous driving, and will report directly to Chairman and CEO He Xiaopeng. 新部门由原自动驾驶负责人刘先明统筹，直接向董事长、CEO 何小鹏汇报。

Sources revealed that the General Intelligence Center will establish secondary organizations around dimensions such as foundational models, Infra base, platform-based delivery, and product and project quality, forming a unified AI technology system for both automobiles and robots. 知情人士透露，通用智能中心将围绕基座模型、Infra 底座、平台化交付、产品与项目质量等维度设立二级组织，形成面向汽车与机器人的统一 AI 技术体系。

This system will simultaneously support multiple business lines in the future, including intelligent driving, smart cockpits, and robotics, achieving resource concentration and shared technological infrastructure. 该体系未来将同时支撑智能驾驶、智能座舱、机器人等多条业务线，实现资源集中与技术底座共享。

Before this integration, the autonomous driving center and smart cockpit center were separately responsible for core capabilities such as intelligent driving and in-car interaction. The two departments operated independently, and their paces were not entirely consistent. 在此次整合前，自动驾驶中心与智能座舱中心分别负责智驾与车内交互等核心能力，两个部门独立运作，节奏并不完全一致。

Some employees stated that past OTA updates felt somewhat fragmented in user experience, and the rapid evolution of AI technology is accelerating the trend of cockpit-driving integration. 有员工表示，过去 OTA 更新在用户体验上略显割裂，而 AI 技术的快速演进正在推动舱驾一体化趋势加速显现。

This merger is also consistent with industry trends. Previously, Tesla announced a $2 billion investment in Elon Musk's xAI and shifted some production lines to the humanoid robot Optimus; Li Auto has also integrated cars and robots into a unified hardware body team. 此次合并也与行业趋势相符。此前，特斯拉宣布向马斯克旗下 xAI 投资 20 亿美元，并将部分产线转向人形机器人 Optimus；理想汽车也已将汽车与机器人纳入统一的硬件身体团队。

Just last month, XPeng's top-tier Ultra model was released, featuring three Turing chips, two for intelligent driving and one for the cockpit. 就在上个月，小鹏发布的顶配车型 Ultra 采用三颗图灵芯片，其中两颗用于智驾，一颗用于座舱。

Its self-developed second-generation VLA vision-action large model is planned for rollout starting this March, capable of cross-domain driving for cars, Robotaxis, robots, and flying cars; the cockpit side is supported by the VLM large model. 其自研第二代 VLA 视觉—动作大模型计划从今年 3 月起推送，可跨域驱动汽车、Robotaxi、机器人与飞行汽车；座舱侧则由 VLM 大模型提供能力支撑。

He Xiaopeng recently stated that automobiles and AI have officially entered an era of cross-domain integration, where smart cockpits and intelligent driving will converge into a 'super intelligent entity'. 何小鹏近期表示，汽车与 AI 正式进入跨域融合时代，智能座舱与智能驾驶将合流为「超级智能体」。

He believes that XPeng's long-term investment in physical AI, computing power, and data gives it the opportunity to become the first Chinese company to seize the 'DeepSeek moment' in autonomous driving. Last year, XPeng delivered 429,000 new vehicles, a year-on-year increase of 126%. 他认为，小鹏长期在物理 AI、算力与数据方面投入，有机会成为中国第一家抓住自动驾驶「DeepSeek 时刻」的公司。去年，小鹏全年交付 42.9 万辆新车，同比增长 126%。

item.title: 腾讯混元研究博客首发姚顺雨团队最新成果：前沿模型仍难真正「用好上下文」
item.guid: 腾讯混元研究博客首发姚顺雨团队最新成果：前沿模型仍难真正「用好上下文」
item.description:
Yesterday, the Tencent Hunyuan team and Fudan University jointly released a new language model evaluation benchmark, CL-bench, and simultaneously launched the Hunyuan research blog, systematically explaining the core bottlenecks of current cutting-edge models in 'contextual learning' capabilities. 昨天，腾讯混元团队与复旦大学联合发布了全新的语言模型评测基准 CL-bench，并同步上线混元研究博客，系统阐述了当前前沿模型在「上下文学习」能力上的核心瓶颈。

It is worth noting that this is Yao Shunyu's first credited research achievement since joining Tencent as Chief AI Scientist. 值得注意的是。这是姚顺雨加入腾讯担任首席 AI 科学家后首次署名的研究成果。

The study points out that while today's top large models perform brilliantly in complex reasoning, programming, and professional exams, these capabilities primarily rely on 'parameterized knowledge' formed during the pre-training phase. 研究指出，尽管当今顶级大模型在复杂推理、编程和专业考试中表现亮眼，但这些能力主要依赖预训练阶段形成的「参数化知识」。

In real-world scenarios, humans often rely on immediately available contextual information to complete tasks, such as reading unfamiliar SDK documentation, understanding new game rules, or inferring patterns from experimental logs. Current models generally perform poorly on these tasks. 在真实世界场景中，人类往往依赖即时出现的上下文信息完成任务，例如阅读从未见过的 SDK 文档、理解新游戏规则或从实验日志中归纳规律，而当前模型在这些任务上普遍表现不佳。

The goal of CL-bench is precisely to measure whether models can learn new knowledge from provided contexts and apply it correctly. The benchmark includes 500 complex contexts, 1899 tasks, and 31607 validation criteria, covering four typical scenarios: domain knowledge reasoning, rule system application, procedural task execution, and experience discovery and simulation. CL-bench 的目标正是衡量模型能否从提供的上下文中学习全新知识并正确应用。基准包含 500 个复杂上下文、1899 个任务和 31607 个验证标准，覆盖四类典型场景：领域知识推理、规则系统应用、程序性任务执行以及经验发现与模拟。

All tasks are completely self-contained and constructed with fictional content, niche knowledge, and variations to ensure no training data contamination. 所有任务均为完全自包含，且通过虚构内容、小众知识和变体构造确保无训练数据污染。

Experimental results show that even the best-performing GPT-5.1 (High) achieved a task success rate of only 23.7% on CL-bench, with the average level being a mere 17.2%. 实验结果显示，即便是表现最好的 GPT-5.1（High），在 CL-bench 上的任务解决率也仅为 23.7%，平均水平更是只有 17.2%。

The research team pointed out that the main reason for model failure is not a lack of information, but rather ignoring or misusing context; while long context processing and instruction following are important, they are insufficient to support true in-context learning; inductive reasoning is particularly difficult, with task success rates often below 10%. 研究团队指出，模型失败的主要原因并非信息缺失，而是忽略或误用上下文；长上下文处理和指令遵循虽重要，但不足以支撑真正的上下文学习；归纳推理尤其困难，任务成功率通常不足 10%。

The study also found that increasing reasoning intensity can bring limited improvements in some tasks, but overall it is still limited by the model's inability to effectively absorb and organize contextual information. Furthermore, the difficulty of context comes not only from its length, but also from its structural complexity and implicit rules. 研究还发现，提高推理强度在部分任务上能带来有限提升，但整体仍受限于模型无法有效吸收和组织上下文信息。此外，context 的难度不仅来自长度，也来自其结构复杂度和隐含规则。

The Tencent Hunyuan team believes that if future models can truly master in-context learning, the role of humans in AI systems will shift from "training data providers" to "context providers." 腾讯混元团队认为，未来模型若能真正掌握上下文学习，人类在 AI 系统中的角色将从「训练数据提供者」转向「上下文提供者」。

However, currently, in-context learning is still "temporary." How to enable models to persistent knowledge gained from context will become an important research direction this year. 但在当下，上下文学习仍是「临时性的」，如何让模型将从上下文中获得的知识持久化，将成为今年的重要研究方向。

The team emphasized that only by making in-context learning capabilities a reality can language models move towards higher-value application scenarios. 团队强调，只有让上下文学习能力走向现实，语言模型才能迈向更高价值的应用场景。

item.title: 零跑年会被指「拉胯」，董事长连夜回应：已启动全面复盘
item.guid: 零跑年会被指「拉胯」，董事长连夜回应：已启动全面复盘
item.description:
According to a report by Red Star Capital Bureau, Leapmotor recently attracted attention after employees complained that its electronics product line annual meeting was "lame." 据红星资本局报道，零跑汽车近日因电子产品线年会被员工吐槽为「拉胯」而引发关注。

Late on the night of February 2nd, Zhu Jiangming, founder and chairman of Leapmotor, responded in an internal letter, stating that this annual meeting exposed shortcomings in the company's organizational capabilities, and a full-process review from preparation to execution has been initiated. 2 月 2 日深夜，零跑汽车创始人兼董事长朱江明在内部信中回应称，本次年会暴露了公司组织能力的短板，已启动从筹备到执行的全流程复盘。

On January 30th, Leapmotor held its electronics product line annual meeting in Huzhou, and several employees reported a "poor experience" at the venue: 1 月 30 日，零跑在湖州举办电子产品线年会，多名员工反映现场「体验不佳」：

    No proper lunch was provided, and HR suggested bringing one's own dry food;

    The venue had no air conditioning, and the weather was cold;

    Insufficient number of toilets and tight hot water supply;

    Poor sound quality; some segments had to be held in a temporarily erected outdoor tent due to rain.

Leapmotor told the media that lunch was indeed not provided, but dinner was "very rich"; regarding the annual meeting prizes, Zhu Jiangming stated that the online rumor of "only Bluetooth mice" was inaccurate. 零跑方面向媒体表示，确实未提供午餐，但晚餐「非常丰盛」；关于年会奖品，朱江明表示网传「只有蓝牙鼠标」的说法并不准确。

According to the revealed menu, the dinner included 6 cold dishes, 17 hot dishes, and a fruit platter, with hot dishes including Buddha Jumps Over the Wall, lobster, soft-shelled turtle, and grouper. Prizes ranged from 500 Bluetooth mice to 20 iPhone 17s, covering multiple levels from lucky draws to super grand prizes. 根据曝光菜单，晚宴包含 6 道凉菜、17 道热菜及水果拼盘，热菜包括佛跳墙、龙虾、甲鱼、石斑鱼等。奖品则从 500 份蓝牙鼠标到 20 部 iPhone 17 不等，涵盖幸运奖至超级大奖多个等级。

Zhu Jiangming emphasized in the internal letter that while the organizing team's choice to hold the annual meeting in a factory warehouse reflected cost awareness, the prerequisite should be "doing things well." 朱江明在内部信中强调，筹办团队选择在工厂仓库办年会虽体现成本意识，但前提应是「把事情做好」。

He stated that the company is still in its growth phase and will continue to strengthen capabilities such as technological innovation, quality improvement, overseas market expansion, and organizational efficiency in the future. 他表示，公司仍在成长阶段，未来将持续强化技术创新、品质提升、海外市场拓展及组织效率等能力。

item.title: HyperOS 4 核心应用以 Rust 与 Flutter 重写，或成「史上最稳定」版本
item.guid: HyperOS-4-核心应用以-Rust-与-Flutter-重写，或成「史上最稳定」版本
item.description:
According to XiaomiTime, Xiaomi is preparing for HyperOS 4, expected to be released in August this year. The new version will completely remove over a decade of legacy code accumulated from MIUI 1 to HyperOS 3, officially entering the "Zero-Legacy" phase. The report even calls it the "most stable" version ever. 据 XiaomiTime 报道，小米正在为今年预计 8 月发布的 HyperOS 4 做准备，新版将彻底移除自 MIUI 1 至 HyperOS 3 累积超过十年的遗留代码，正式迈向「零遗留」（Zero‑Legacy）阶段。报道甚至将其称为「史上最稳定」版本。

In fact, this change has already begun to appear in the recent HyperOS 3.1 version: native HyperOS SDKs have been introduced in system modules such as Weather and Gallery, while MIUI SDKs have been simultaneously deprecated. 事实上，这一更改在近期的 HyperOS 3.1 版本中已初见端倪：天气、相册等系统模块中引入原生 HyperOS SDK，并同步弃用 MIUI SDK。

The report points out that HyperOS 4 will completely remove the compatibility layer, fundamentally freeing the system architecture from historical baggage and becoming a brand-new system form independent of MIUI. 报道指出，HyperOS 4 将完全移除兼容层，使系统架构从根本上摆脱历史包袱，成为独立于 MIUI 的全新系统形态。

At the application level, Xiaomi is rewriting core system applications with Rust and Google Flutter, with HyperOS 3.1 already piloted. 在应用层面，小米正以 Rust 与 Google Flutter 重写核心系统应用，HyperOS 3.1 已率先试点。

The Flutter engine will unify UI rendering and logical structure, replacing the fragmented architecture previously based on Java/Kotlin. As HyperOS 4 progresses, this refactoring will be fully rolled out. Flutter 引擎将统一 UI 渲染与逻辑结构，替代过去基于 Java/Kotlin 的碎片化架构。随着 HyperOS 4 推进，这一重构将全面铺开。

However, this also means that users of older versions will no longer be able to install new applications. Since applications rewritten with Flutter and Rust are no longer compatible with HyperOS 3 and earlier versions, the operation of "installing new system apps on old system versions" will become a thing of the past. 不过，这也意味着旧版本用户将无法继续安装新版应用。由于 Flutter 与 Rust 重写后的应用不再兼容 HyperOS 3 及更早版本，「在旧版系统上安装新系统 App」的操作将成为历史。

In terms of performance, removing redundant code has varying effects on devices of different tiers. Flagship models, with ample hardware headroom, see limited performance improvements; while mid-to-low-end devices will experience more noticeable fluidity improvements due to reduced resource consumption, alleviating stuttering issues previously caused by memory and processor bottlenecks. 在性能层面，移除冗余代码对不同档位设备影响不一。旗舰机型因硬件余量充足，性能提升有限；而中低端设备将因减少资源占用而获得更明显的流畅度改善，缓解过去因内存与处理器瓶颈导致的卡顿问题。

item.title: 雷军宣布小米十余篇论文入选 ICLR 2026 顶会
item.guid: 雷军宣布小米十余篇论文入选-ICLR-2026-顶会
item.description:
Recently, several of Xiaomi's artificial intelligence research achievements have been successfully selected for ICLR 2026. 近日，小米多项人工智能研究成果近日成功入选 ICLR 2026。

ICLR is an important international top-tier conference in the field of artificial intelligence, and this year's conference will be held in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, in April. ICLR 是人工智能领域的重要国际顶级会议，今年会议将于 4 月在巴西里约热内卢举行。

From the publicly available content, Xiaomi has more than ten papers selected this time, covering multiple key technical modules ranging from model training paradigms and inference frameworks to autonomous driving world models. 从公开内容来看，小米此次共有十余篇论文入选，涵盖从模型训练范式、推理框架到自动驾驶世界模型等多个关键技术模块。

Lei Jun, founder, chairman, and CEO of Xiaomi, stated on Weibo that the selected research directions cover multiple cutting-edge fields such as multimodal inference, reinforcement learning, GUI Agent, end-to-end autonomous driving, and audio generation, reflecting Xiaomi's phased achievements in long-term investment in underlying technologies. Some key research includes: 小米创办人，董事长兼 CEO 雷军在微博表示，此次入选的研究方向覆盖多模态推理、强化学习、GUI Agent、端到端自动驾驶以及音频生成等多个前沿领域，体现了小米在底层技术长期投入的阶段性成果。部分重点研究包括：

    Shuffle-R1 Reinforcement Learning Framework: Solves the problems of advantage collapse and trajectory silence through dynamic reorganization at the data level, significantly improving training efficiency in multimodal inference tasks;

    MobileIPL GUI Agent Framework: Optimizes the inference process of mobile agents through iterative preference learning, achieving leading performance on multiple benchmarks;

    FutureMind Small Model Inference Framework: Infuses strategic thinking patterns into small models through adaptive knowledge distillation, enhancing complex inference capabilities without additional training;

    ReCogDrive End-to-End Autonomous Driving Framework: Integrates visual language models, diffusion-based trajectory planning, and reinforcement learning, achieving significant improvements in both open-loop and closed-loop evaluations;

    WorldSplat 4D Scene Generation Model: Generates 3D-consistent multi-trajectory driving videos through a 4D-aware diffusion model, providing high-quality data for autonomous driving training;

    Dream4Drive World Model Generation Framework: Replaces large-scale real data with high-quality synthetic data, achieving performance improvements for perception models under extremely low data conditions.

item.title: 追觅 CEO 俞浩对标马斯克：拒绝「个人英雄主义」，选择「带一群人」
item.guid: 追觅-CEO-俞浩对标马斯克：拒绝「个人英雄主义」，选择「带一群人」
item.description:
Yesterday, Yu Hao, founder and CEO of Dreame Technology, shared his personal views and company vision on Weibo. 昨天，追觅科技创始人兼 CEO 俞浩在微博上集中发表个人观点与公司愿景。

He described Elon Musk as "quite individualistic, a personal hero," and emphasized his own preference for "climbing to the peak with a group of people," proposing the team philosophy that "one person can go faster, a group of people can go further." 他将马斯克形容为「比较独，个人英雄主义」，并强调自己更偏好「带着一群人一起攀登高峰」，提出「一个人可以走得更快，一群人可以走得更远」的团队理念。

Furthermore, Yu Hao reiterated his "mission" - "to increase human productivity by 100 times and human total wealth by 100 times in the next 20 years," and proposed the long-term goal of "cultivating 200,000 global innovation leaders by training 10,000 people annually over 20 years." 此外，俞浩重申了自己的「使命」——「未来 20 年，推动人类生产力提高 100 倍、推动人类总财富增长 100 倍」，并提出「每年 1 万人，20 年培养 20 万全球创新领袖」的长期目标。

At the same time, he called on users on Weibo to vote for the "Top Ten Most Influential Stars in the World," stating that he "plans to sign all ten most influential stars in the world" to strengthen the brand's presence in popular culture through celebrity collaborations and fan participation. 同时，他在微博上号召用户为「全世界最有影响力的十大明星」投票，称「打算把全世界最有影响力的十大明星全部签了」，通过明星合作与粉丝参与，强化品牌在大众文化层面的存在感。

He previously announced that Dreame's annual meeting this year would directly become a concert, "Dare to Dream, Dare to Act · Dreame Night," to be held on February 4th at the Suzhou Olympic Sports Center, emphasizing "pampering our own employees" and upgrading the traditional annual meeting into a "new type of annual meeting" for both employees and users. 他此前发文宣布，追觅今年的年会将直接变成一场演唱会，《敢梦敢为 · 追觅之夜》将于 2 月 4 日在苏州奥林匹克体育中心举办，并强调「自己的员工自己宠」，把传统年会升级为面向员工与用户的「新型年会」。

item.title: Waymo 完成 160 亿美元融资，计划今年进入 20 座新城市
item.guid: Waymo-完成-160-亿美元融资，计划今年进入-20-座新城市
item.description:
Yesterday, Waymo announced the completion of a new round of financing totaling $16 billion. This round was led by Dragoneer Investment Group, and after its completion, Waymo's latest valuation reached $126 billion, a significant increase from last year's $4.5 billion valuation. 昨天，Waymo 宣布完成 160 亿美元的新一轮融资。此次融资由 Dragoneer Investment Group 领投，融资完成后，Waymo 最新估值达到 1260 亿美元，较去年 45 亿美元的估值大幅提升。

Waymo stated in a blog post that the company will use part of the funds to expand its vehicle procurement scale to support its plan to enter at least 20 new cities this year. Waymo 在博客中表示，公司将利用部分资金扩大车辆采购规模，以支持其在今年进入至少 20 个新城市的计划。

Currently, Waymo operates over 2,500 robotaxis in 6 U.S. cities, making it one of the few companies in the U.S. to offer fully autonomous paid services. In contrast, Amazon's Zoox is still in the free trial operation phase, and Tesla has not yet removed in-car safety drivers. 目前，Waymo 在美国 6 座城市运营超过 2500 辆 robotaxi，是美国少数提供完全无人驾驶付费服务的企业之一。相比之下，亚马逊旗下 Zoox 仍处于免费试运营阶段，而特斯拉尚未取消车内安全员。

This round of financing attracted several new investors, including Dragoneer, Sequoia Capital, and DST Global; existing shareholders such as Andreessen Horowitz, Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth fund Mubadala, Fidelity, Silver Lake, Temasek, and T. Rowe Price continued to increase their investments. 本轮融资吸引了多家新投资者，包括 Dragoneer、红杉资本和 DST Global；老股东如 Andreessen Horowitz、阿布扎比主权基金 Mubadala、Fidelity、Silver Lake、Temasek 和 T. Rowe Price 等继续加码。

The Verge pointed out that although autonomous driving is seen as a future direction for reducing labor costs, robotaxis remain a typical capital-intensive business. Significant costs are required for the vehicles themselves, sensors and computing platforms, remote monitoring systems, as well as operational aspects like charging, cleaning, and calibration. The Verge 指出，尽管自动驾驶出行被视为降低人力成本的未来方向，但 robotaxi 仍是典型的重资产业务。车辆本身、传感器与计算平台、远程监控系统，以及充电、清洁与校准等运营环节均需投入大量成本。

Waymo also plans to expand its services to high-profile cities such as New York, London, and Tokyo, accelerating the global deployment of its robotaxi business. Waymo 还计划将服务拓展至纽约、伦敦和东京等高曝光度城市，加速其 robotaxi 业务的全球化布局。

However, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) just launched an investigation last week into an incident where a Waymo vehicle injured a child in Santa Monica, which may bring some regulatory pressure to its expansion pace. 不过，上周美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）刚刚对一起 Waymo 车辆在圣塔莫尼卡撞伤儿童的事故展开调查，或将对其扩张节奏带来一定监管压力。

item.title: QuestMobile：AI 成移动互联网最强增长引擎，AIGC 应用月活净增超 2 亿
item.guid: QuestMobile：AI-成移动互联网最强增长引擎，AIGC-应用月活净增超-2-亿
item.description:
Yesterday, research firm QuestMobile released its latest research report, showing that AI has become the core driving force for mobile internet growth this year, with AIGC apps and plugin ecosystems contributing the most significant increment. 昨天，调研机构 QuestMobile 发表最新研报，显示 AI 已成为今年移动互联网增长的最核心驱动力，其中 AIGC APP 与插件生态贡献了最显著的增量。

The monthly active user (MAU) scale of AIGC applications achieved a net increase of over 200 million last year, with a year-on-year growth rate of 150.4%. The MAU scale of AI plugins reached 696 million, a year-on-year increase of 37.8%, becoming a key force in driving user time growth and ecosystem restructuring. AIGC 应用月活用户规模在去年实现净增超 2 亿，同比增速达到 150.4%，AI 插件月活规模则达到 6.96 亿，同比提升 37.8%，成为推动用户时长增长与生态重构的关键力量。

In addition, the mini-program ecosystem continues to expand on WeChat, Alipay, and Baidu platforms, with life services becoming the core scenario for all three platforms. On the WeChat platform, the number of life service mini-programs with over 10 million monthly active users reached 68, significantly higher than the 36 similar apps, demonstrating the platform's strong traffic aggregation effect. 此外，小程序生态在微信、支付宝及百度平台持续扩张，生活服务成为三大平台的核心场景。微信平台中，生活服务类月活超千万的小程序数量达到 68 个，远高于同类 APP 的 36 个，平台流量聚合作用明显。

At the same time, the continuous popularity of short-form drama content has driven the rapid growth of video mini-programs, with relevant mini-programs accounting for 17% and 36% respectively in the TOP100 of WeChat and Douyin ecosystems. 同时，短剧内容的持续走热推动视频类小程序快速增长，微信与抖音生态中相关小程序在 TOP100 中占比分别达到 17% 与 36%。

Beyond the overall trends, the report also revealed segmented changes across various industries and scenarios: 在整体趋势之外，报告还披露了多个行业与场景的细分变化：

    The total monthly active user (MAU) scale of the mobile internet reached 1.276 billion, with users' average monthly usage time at 186.2 hours, a year-on-year increase of 8.4%, primarily driven by AI scenario penetration.

    Apps like Tongcheng Travel and Taobao Flash Sale achieved a breakthrough in panoramic traffic by relying on mini-programs, with their panoramic traffic reaching 245 million and 221 million respectively in December last year.

    Smart TV terminals reached 289 million monthly active devices, with OTT applications like Galaxy Qiyiguo, CIBN Kumiao Film & TV, and Yunshitong Jiguang all exceeding 60 million devices, making the home big screen a new traffic hub.

    Industries such as life services, tourism, finance, and automotive generally show a multi-terminal collaborative trend of "APP + Mini-program + Content".

    The AI application industry is accelerating its multi-terminal layout. Sina News's ecosystem traffic reached 350 million, and the Smart Xiaolang AI plugin has become a new information portal; Babytree Parenting is deepening the AI integration of parenting scenarios.

    Brand-side growth is significant, with monthly active users of Xtep and Li-Ning's mini-programs increasing by 134.8% and 190.3% year-on-year respectively. The catering and retail industries have achieved user scale growth by relying on mini-programs.

item.title: 奔驰部分车型降价 10%
item.guid: 奔驰部分车型降价-10%
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, the China Automobile Dealers Association recently confirmed that Mercedes-Benz has lowered the manufacturer's suggested retail prices for some models, with an overall reduction of about 10%. This is one of the significant adjustments made by the Mercedes-Benz brand in terms of business policy this year. 据界面新闻报道，全国工商联汽车经销商商会近日确认，奔驰已下调部分车型的厂商建议零售价，整体降幅约为 10%。这是今年以来奔驰品牌在商务政策层面的重要调整之一。

The association stated that although this adjustment still falls short of dealers' overall demands, it is expected to alleviate dealers' working capital pressure to some extent and is seen as a pragmatic step taken by Mercedes-Benz in optimizing its business policies. 商会表示，尽管此次调整与经销商的整体诉求仍有差距，但有望在一定程度上缓解经销商的流动资金压力，被视为奔驰在优化商务政策方面迈出的务实一步。

At the same time, the association recently received feedback from several car brand dealers, pointing out unreasonable practices in the business policies of some brands, mainly focusing on issues such as excessive inventory pressure, severe price inversions, complex rebate fulfillment conditions, too many policy bundles, and high arbitrariness in adjustments. 与此同时，商会近期也收到多家汽车品牌经销商的反馈，指出部分品牌在商务政策上存在不合理做法，主要集中在库存压力过高、价格倒挂严重、返利兑现条件复杂、政策捆绑较多以及调整随意性大等问题。

For brands with more concentrated feedback, the association has initiated verification surveys and plans to communicate and coordinate with relevant authorities and brand owners based on the survey results in the future. 对于反映较为集中的品牌，商会已启动核实性调研，并计划在后续根据调研结果与主管部门及相关品牌方沟通协调。

item.title: Adobe Animate 官宣 3 月停服：27 年历史软件将退场
item.guid: Adobe-Animate-官宣-3-月停服：27-年历史软件将退场
item.description:
According to The Verge, Adobe announced that it will officially stop selling its 2D animation software Adobe Animate on March 1st and will gradually close download channels for related files over the next few years. 据 The Verge 报道，Adobe 宣布将于 3 月 1 日正式停止销售 2D 动画软件 Adobe Animate，并将在未来数年逐步关闭相关文件的下载通道。

Adobe's official FAQ states that this move is due to the emergence of "new platforms that better meet user needs." Regular users can continue to access and download Animate files before March 1, 2027 , while the deadline for enterprise users is extended to March 1, 2029 . Adobe 官网 FAQ 显示，此举是因为出现了「更能满足用户需求的新平台」。普通用户可在 2027 年 3 月 1 日 前继续访问并下载 Animate 文件，企业用户的截止时间则延长至 2029 年 3 月 1 日 。

Before then, the application will still be available for download, and Adobe will continue to provide support. 在此之前，应用仍可下载，Adobe 也会持续提供支持。

The discontinuation of Animate has provoked a strong reaction from the creator community. Animate 的停用引发创作者群体强烈反应。

The team behind the short animation "Chikn Nuggit" stated on social platform X that they still rely on Animate to produce the entire series, believing that its discontinuation will "harm countless jobs in the industry and turn a large number of existing works into lost media." 短片动画《Chikn Nuggit》团队在社交平台 X 上表示，他们仍依赖 Animate 制作整部系列，认为停用将「伤害行业内无数岗位，并让大量既有作品成为失落媒介」。

David Firth, creator of "Salad Fingers," also stated that he still uses the software. Megacharlie, a technical artist at Jackbox Games, pointed out that Animate is still widely used for daily creation in high-budget TV animation, films, game studios, and by a large number of independent creators. 《Salad Fingers》创作者 David Firth 也表示仍在使用该软件。Jackbox Games 技术美术 Megacharlie 指出，Animate 仍被广泛用于高预算电视动画、电影、游戏工作室以及大量独立创作者的日常创作。

The report also pointed out that over the past year, Adobe has clearly shifted its focus to AI tools, including introducing AI editing features in multiple applications and releasing the Firefly series of models for the entertainment industry. The departure of Animate is also seen as part of Adobe's product line adjustment towards the AI era. 报道还指出，过去一年，Adobe 明显将重心转向 AI 工具，包括在多款应用中推出 AI 编辑功能，并发布用于娱乐行业的 Firefly 系列模型。 Animate 的退场也被视为 Adobe 产品线向 AI 时代调整的一部分。

    1996: Software company FutureWave Software launched FutureSplash Animator;

    Late 1996: Macromedia acquired and renamed it Flash;

    2005: Adobe acquired Macromedia and named it Adobe Flash Professional;

    2015: As Flash gradually exited the web stage, Adobe renamed it Adobe Animate;

    2026: Adobe announced it would stop selling Animate and initiated a phased sunset plan.

item.title: 全球首款混动无人运输机在重庆首飞
item.guid: 全球首款混动无人运输机在重庆首飞
item.description:
According to CCTV News, the Rainbow YH-1000S hybrid unmanned transport aircraft developed by the Eleventh Institute of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation recently completed its maiden flight in Liangping, Chongqing. This marks another new large-scale unmanned transport aircraft model launched to meet global market demand, following the maiden flight of the Rainbow YH-1000 in May last year. 据央视新闻报道，中国航天科技集团十一院研制的彩虹 YH‑1000S 混合动力无人运输机近日在重庆梁平完成首飞。这是继去年 5 月彩虹 YH‑1000 首飞之后，面向全球市场需求推出的又一大型无人运输机新机型。

The maiden flight model was equipped with a high-power hybrid powertrain jointly developed with a leading new energy vehicle company, significantly shortening takeoff and landing distances and improving payload and range performance. Officials stated that the aircraft has successfully completed in-flight performance verification. 首飞机型挂载了与新能源汽车头部企业联合研发的大功率混合动力总成，显著缩短起降距离，并提升载重与航程表现。官方表示，该机已顺利完成空中飞行性能验证。

The development of the Rainbow YH-1000S is regarded as an important exploration of cross-industry integration of core technologies between China's drone industry and automotive industry. By sharing supply chain resources and adopting modular production methods, the new model has achieved a significant reduction in R&D and manufacturing costs, and is also seen as a typical case promoting the development of unmanned logistics in the low-altitude economy. 彩虹 YH‑1000S 的研发被视为国内无人机产业与汽车产业核心技术跨界融合的重要探索。通过共享供应链资源与采用模块化生产方式，新机型在研发制造成本上实现明显下降，也被视为推动低空经济无人物流发展的典型案例。

Designed according to airworthiness standards, this aircraft model can be used for international logistics transportation and delivery, emergency rescue and disaster relief, artificial weather modification, marine monitoring, and maritime supervision, positioning itself as a large unmanned transport platform. 该机型按照适航标准设计，可用于国际物流运输投送、应急救援减灾、人工影响天气、海洋监测及海事监管等场景，定位为大型无人运输平台。

item.title: 💡 电子签名巨头 CEO：AI 不应充当律师，而是合同审查的「加速器」
item.guid: 💡-电子签名巨头-CEO：AI-不应充当律师，而是合同审查的「加速器」
item.description:
Recently, Allan Thygesen, CEO of e-signature giant DocuSign, elaborated on the company's strategy to transition towards "Intelligent Agreement Management" in the latest episode of the "Decoder" podcast, and directly addressed concerns from the legal community regarding AI involvement in contract interpretation. 近日，电子签名巨头 DocuSign CEO Allan Thygesen 在最新一期《Decoder》播客节目中，详细阐述了公司向「智能协议管理」（Intelligent Agreement Management）转型的战略，并正面回应了法律界对于 AI 介入合同解读的担忧。

Regarding host Nilay Patel's point that "letting robots interpret legal documents will raise lawyers' vigilance," Thygesen explicitly acknowledged the risks, emphasizing that DocuSign's AI product's core principles are "not to act as a lawyer" and "not to provide legal advice." 针对主持人 Nilay Patel 提出的「让机器人解读法律文档会引发律师警惕」这一观点，Thygesen 明确承认其中的风险，强调 DocuSign 的 AI 产品核心原则是「不充当律师」且「不提供法律建议」。

He pointed out that if software attempts to tell users whether a contract is "legal" or "perfect," it will face significant legal liability risks. Therefore, DocuSign positions its AI as an "analyst" responsible for reading, summarizing, and extracting information, rather than a legal advisor with decision-making power. 他指出，如果软件试图告诉用户某份合同是否「合法」或「完美」，将面临巨大的法律责任风险，因此 DocuSign 将其 AI 定位为负责阅读、总结和提取信息的「分析师」，而非拥有决策权的法律顾问。

To address this pain point and mitigate risks, DocuSign introduced a "Playbook" mechanism. 为了解决这一痛点并规避风险，DocuSign 引入了「剧本」（Playbook）机制。

Enterprise clients can pre-upload standard clauses (such as payment terms, governing law, liability caps, etc.). The AI's task is to objectively compare the received new contract with this "Playbook," highlighting specific deviations rather than making subjective legal judgments. 企业客户可预先上传标准条款（如付款期限、管辖法律、责任上限等），AI 的任务是将接收到的新合同与该「剧本」进行客观比对，高亮显示出具体的偏差（Deviation），而非进行主观的法律判断。

He gave an example: the AI would prompt the user, "The received contract requires 60-day payment, while your company's standard is 30 days." The final decision on whether to accept the clause remains with humans. 他举例称，AI 会提示用户「收到的合同要求 60 天付款，而贵司标准是 30 天」，最终是否接受该条款的决定权仍保留在人类手中。

At the technical implementation level, Thygesen revealed that DocuSign does not train foundational large models itself, but rather calls cutting-edge models via Azure and Google, using "Retrieval Augmented Generation" (RAG) technology to curb AI hallucinations. 在技术实现层面，Thygesen 透露 DocuSign 并不自行训练基础大模型，而是通过 Azure 和 Google 调用前沿模型，通过「检索增强生成」（RAG）技术来遏制 AI 幻觉。

The system is strictly limited to answering based only on the current document's content, cutting off the model's path to "fill in the blanks" using external training data. 系统被强制限制仅基于当前文档内容进行回答，切断了模型利用外部训练数据进行「脑补」的路径。

Furthermore, to enhance credibility, DocuSign requires every AI-generated summary or risk alert to include "citation traceability," allowing users to click and jump directly to the specific paragraph in the original contract, ensuring lawyers and professionals can verify the original information at any time. 此外，为了增强可信度，DocuSign 要求 AI 生成的每一个总结或风险提示都必须附带「引用溯源」，用户点击即可直接跳转至合同原文的具体段落，确保律师和专业人员能够随时核查原始信息。

Thygesen believes that current PDF contracts, once signed, are often archived via email, becoming "dead data" that is difficult to retrieve, like entering a "deep, dark digital black hole." Thygesen 认为，目前的 PDF 合同在签署后往往通过电子邮件归档，沦为难以检索的「死数据」，就像进入了一个「又深又暗的数字黑洞」。

DocuSign's vision is to use AI to transform these unstructured pixels into structured data that can trigger workflows, thereby connecting with enterprise systems like Salesforce and Workday, achieving a leap from a simple e-signature tool to a full lifecycle agreement management platform. DocuSign 的愿景是通过 AI 将这些非结构化的像素转化为可触发工作流的结构化数据，从而连接 Salesforce、Workday 等企业系统，实现从简单的电子签名工具向全生命周期协议管理平台的跨越。

item.title: 智谱发布 GLM‑OCR：轻量模型实现 SOTA 文档识别
item.guid: 智谱发布-GLM‑OCR：轻量模型实现-SOTA-文档识别
item.description:
Yesterday, Zhipu officially released and open-sourced the new lightweight professional OCR model GLM-OCR, with "small size, high precision" as its core selling point. With only 0.9B parameters, it has achieved leading results in multiple authoritative benchmarks: 昨天，智谱正式发布并开源全新轻量级专业 OCR 模型 GLM‑OCR，以「小尺寸、高精度」为核心卖点，参数量仅 0.9B，在多项权威基准中取得领先成绩：

    Achieved 94.6 points in OmniDocBench V1.5, reaching SOTA level, with overall accuracy close to Gemini‑3‑Pro;

    Outperforms multiple specialized OCR models in tasks such as text, formula, and table recognition, as well as information extraction; supports photos, scanned documents, screenshots, and PDFs, covering special texts like handwriting, seals, and code;

    Under the same hardware conditions, PDF processing throughput can reach 1.86 pages/second, and image processing can reach 0.67 images/second, significantly leading similar solutions in speed; the API price is 0.2 yuan/million Tokens, and the official statement claims the cost is about 1/10 of traditional OCR;

    Adopts an "encoder-decoder" architecture, with self-developed CogViT integrated on the visual side, and introduces CLIP strategy pre-training on billions of image-text pair data;

    Incorporates Multi-Token Prediction Loss (MTP) and full-task reinforcement learning to enhance generalization capabilities for complex documents;

    The overall process adopts a two-stage paradigm: "layout analysis → parallel recognition".

GLM‑OCR has been open-sourced on platforms like Github and Hugging Face, offering online experience at ocr.z.ai and API services. Zhipu stated that in the future, they will continue to expand model sizes, cover more languages, and advance video OCR capabilities. GLM‑OCR 已在 Github、Hugging Face 等平台开源，并提供在线体验 ocr.z.ai 与 API 服务。智谱表示，未来将持续扩展模型尺寸，覆盖更多语言，并推进视频 OCR 能力。

item.title: vivo X300 Ultra 与 X300 Max 入网，预计春节后发布
item.guid: vivo-X300-Ultra-与-X300-Max-入网，预计春节后发布
item.description:
According to blogger "Digital Chat Station", multiple models of the vivo X300 series (V2547A, V2547DA, V2548A) have passed network access certification, all supporting the N79 frequency band. 据博主「数码闲聊站」消息，vivo X300 系列多款机型（V2547A、V2547DA、V2548A）已通过入网认证，均支持 N79 频段。

Among them, V2547A corresponds to X300 Ultra, V2547DA is its Beidou satellite communication version, and V2548A is considered to be the first appearance of the named X300 Max. 其中，V2547A 对应 X300 Ultra，V2547DA 为其北斗卫星通信版本，而 V2548A 则被认为是首次出现命名的 X300 Max。

According to leaks, the X300 Max will feature a 6.78-inch 1.5K OLED large flat screen, equipped with an ultrasonic under-display fingerprint sensor, a 200-megapixel main camera, and a combination of an ultra-wide-angle and a mid-range periscope telephoto lens. 根据爆料，X300 Max 将采用 6.78 英寸 1.5K OLED 大直屏，配备超声波屏下指纹，主摄为 2 亿像素，并搭载超广角与中端潜望长焦组合。

In terms of processor, it is expected to be equipped with Dimensity 9500, with a built-in large 7000mAh battery, positioned as a large-screen, long-endurance flagship. Previously, the industry referred to it as "X300s", but from the latest information, X300 Max will be its official name. 处理器方面则预计搭载天玑 9500，内置约 7000mAh 大电池，定位大屏长续航旗舰。此前业内将其称为「X300s」，但从最新信息看，X300 Max 将成为正式命名。

According to online leaks, the X300 Ultra imaging system will debut with a "dual 200-megapixel triple-camera full large sensor" solution, including: 据网传爆料，X300 Ultra 影像系统将首发「双 2 亿三摄全大底」方案，包括：

    200-megapixel 35mm custom main camera

    50-megapixel 1/1.28-inch ultra-wide-angle

    200-megapixel 85mm Zeiss periscope telephoto lens, supporting external teleconverters for long-range shooting scenarios like concerts and sports events

The phone will feature a 2K top-tier flat screen and will be among the first to be equipped with Qualcomm's fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition platform, along with a large-capacity Blue Ocean battery. 该机将采用 2K 顶级直屏，并首批搭载高通第五代骁龙 8 至尊版平台，配备大容量蓝海电池。

item.title: 索尼降噪豆 6 曝光，有望本月发布
item.guid: 索尼降噪豆-6-曝光，有望本月发布
item.description:
According to The Mac Observer, leaked information about Sony's "Noise Cancelling Buds 6" WF‑1000XM6 recently surfaced, indicating that the new model features various degrees of upgrades in design, audio processing, and connection stability, while the price will also be increased to approximately $329 in the US and €299 in Europe. 据《The Mac Observer》报道，近日，索尼「降噪豆 6」WF‑1000XM6 的泄露信息流出，显示新款在设计、音频处理与连接稳定性方面均有不同程度的升级，同时价格也将上调至美国约 329 美元、欧洲约 299 欧元。

Leaked renders show that the WF-1000XM6's appearance continues the overall style of the XM5 but adopts a matte finish and comes with a smaller capsule-shaped charging case. The earbuds themselves support IPX4 water resistance and come standard with foam ear tips. 泄露的渲染图显示，WF-1000XM6 的外观延续 XM5 的整体风格，但改用哑光材质，并配备更小的胶囊形充电盒，耳机本体支持 IPX4 防水并标配泡沫耳塞。

Key feature upgrades for WF‑1000XM6 include: WF‑1000XM6 的主要功能升级包括：

    DSEE Ultimate Local Operation: Real-time AI audio upscaling achieved for the first time on Sony TWS headphones, enhancing compressed audio details;

    MediaTek MT2855 Chip: Provides faster processing power, potentially leading to better noise cancellation and energy efficiency;

    Improved Antenna Gain: Enhances wireless connection stability and reduces disconnections;

    Three-Microphone System: Each earbud is equipped with 3 external microphones for calls and noise cancellation processing.

Reports indicate that Sony is expected to open pre-orders for the WF-1000XM6 in mid-February this year, with an official launch in late February. 报道指出，索尼预计在今年 2 月中旬开启 WF-1000XM6 的预购，并在 2 月下旬正式上市。

item.title: 《QQ 农场》手游版回归定档 2 月 6 日，曾创 1.2 亿在线纪录
item.guid: 《QQ-农场》手游版回归定档-2-月-6-日，曾创-1.2-亿在线纪录
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, Tencent announced that "QQ Classic Farm" will officially return on February 6th, simultaneously launching on QQ and WeChat. 据界面新闻报道，腾讯宣布《QQ 经典农场》将于 2 月 6 日正式回归，并同步登陆 QQ 和微信。

It is reported that this returning version continues the core gameplay of "QQ Farm" launched in 2009, including planting crops, raising animals, and managing farm products, and is considered by many netizens as an authentic nostalgic reproduction. 据悉，本次回归版本延续 2009 年上线的《QQ 农场》核心玩法，包括种植作物、饲养动物与农产品经营等，被不少网友视为原汁原味的情怀复刻。

"QQ Farm" once set a record in 2010 with a peak concurrent online user count of 120 million and over 300 million monthly active users. "Did you steal vegetables tonight?" also became a social code among the post-80s and post-90s generations at that time. 《QQ 农场》曾在 2010 年创下最高同时在线人数 1.2 亿、月活跃用户超 3 亿的纪录，「今晚你偷菜了吗」也成为当时 80 后、90 后的社交暗号。

Last December, the mobile version of "QQ Farm" obtained its publication license. From January 27th to February 2nd this year, "QQ Classic Farm" launched a data-wiping test to warm up for its official return. 去年 12 月，移动端《QQ 农场》已获得版号。今年 1 月 27 日至 2 月 2 日，《QQ 经典农场》开启删档测试，为正式回归预热。

At Tencent's 2025 Annual Employee Conference held on January 26th, Tencent Chairman and CEO Pony Ma mentioned how to use AI to make "old trees sprout new buds," specifically highlighting the return of classic products like QQ Show and QQ Farm. 在 1 月 26 日举行的腾讯 2025 年度员工大会上，腾讯公司董事会主席兼 CEO 马化腾提到如何利用 AI 让「老树发新芽」，并特别点名 QQ 秀与 QQ 农场等经典产品的回归。

He stated that QQ is more actively listening to user feedback and promoting the relaunch of old products in new forms. Previously, on January 24th, QQ officially announced the return of QQ Show, coinciding with its 23rd anniversary. The new version of QQ Show includes features like AI-generated avatars, dynamic profile pictures, and group chat interactions. 他表示，QQ 正在更积极倾听用户声音，推动老产品以新形态重启。此前 1 月 24 日，QQ 官宣 QQ 秀回归，恰逢其上线 23 周年。新版 QQ 秀加入 AI 生成形象、动态头像、群聊互动等功能。

item.title: 蜜雪冰城招聘多个乐园相关岗位：月薪 1.1 万起
item.guid: 蜜雪冰城招聘多个乐园相关岗位：月薪-1.1-万起
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, Mixue Ice Cream & Tea recently posted multiple job openings related to theme parks on recruitment platforms, sparking external attention on whether it will cross over into building its own theme park. 据界面新闻报道，蜜雪冰城近期在招聘平台上集中发布多项与主题乐园相关的岗位信息，引发外界对其是否将跨界建设自有乐园的关注。

BOSS Zhipin shows that Mixue Ice Cream & Tea is recruiting for positions such as Theme Park Performance Coordinator, Theme Park Content Writer, Theme Park Merchandise Coordinator, and Engineering Management (Theme Park Project), with salaries ranging from 11K to 24K per month, requiring 5 to 10 years of relevant experience, and all located in Zhengzhou, Henan. BOSS 直聘显示，蜜雪冰城正在招聘乐园演艺统筹、乐园内容编剧、乐园周边产品统筹以及工程管理（乐园项目）等岗位，薪资区间为月薪 11K 至 24K，要求 5 至 10 年相关经验，工作地点均位于河南郑州。

Among them, the Engineering Management (Theme Park Project) position offers the highest salary, with responsibilities covering the entire process of theme park management from planning, design, construction to opening. Applicants are required to have experience managing at least one theme park project with an investment exceeding 200 million yuan, and be familiar with the engineering implementation of amusement equipment installation, theme packaging processes, and immersive experience projects (such as VR, special effects theaters). 其中，工程管理岗（乐园项目）薪资最高，职责覆盖主题乐园从规划、设计、施工到开业的全流程管理，并要求应聘者具备操盘至少 1 个投资额超 2 亿元主题乐园项目的经验，熟悉游乐设备安装、主题包装工艺及沉浸式体验项目（如 VR、特效剧场）的工程实施。

Many positions emphasize a preference for candidates with project experience in large theme parks such as Disney, Universal Studios, and Chimelong. For example: 多个岗位均强调拥有迪士尼、环球影城、长隆等大型乐园的项目经验优先。例如：

    Theme Park Performance Coordinator needs to have experience in managing large theme park IPs and be able to plan holiday or hot topic themed performance content around IP characters;

    Theme Park Content Writer needs to be familiar with the narrative logic of well-known domestic and international IP theme parks and be responsible for constructing the park's story background and experience flow;

    Theme Park Merchandise Coordinator needs to understand the merchandise operation models of cultural tourism IPs such as Pop Mart, Disney, and Universal Studios.

In recent years, Mixue Ice Cream & Tea has continuously expanded its business territory. The company primarily deals in fruit drinks, tea drinks, ice cream, and coffee products, listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange last year, and has successively entered new fields such as breakfast and beer. Last October, the company spent 297 million yuan to acquire a 53% stake in Fulujia, entering the freshly tapped beer market. 近年来，蜜雪冰城持续拓展业务版图。公司主营果饮、茶饮、冰淇淋及咖啡产品，于去年在港交所上市，并陆续进入早餐、啤酒等新领域。去年 10 月，公司斥资 2.97 亿元收购福鹿家 53% 股权，布局现打鲜啤市场。

In terms of IP operations, Mixue Ice Cream & Tea has created the "Snow King" image and launched the animated series "Snow King is Here," with the first three episodes exceeding 2 million views on Bilibili. The company also established Snow King Ai Dongman Culture (Beijing) Co., Ltd., responsible for IP content operation and commercialization. 在 IP 运营方面，蜜雪冰城已打造「雪王」形象，并推出动画片《雪王驾到》，在 B 站前三集播放量突破 200 万。公司还成立雪王爱动漫文化（北京）有限公司，负责 IP 内容运营与商业化。

The Henan Provincial Department of Culture and Tourism recently mentioned Mixue Ice Cream & Tea twice in its draft for public comment on the construction of the cultural tourism industry system, proposing to support it as a well-known trendy play brand for debut activities and include it as one of the key enterprises promoting the integrated development of business, culture, and tourism. 河南省文化和旅游厅近日发布的文旅产业体系建设征求意见稿中两次提及蜜雪冰城，提出支持其作为知名潮玩品牌开展首发活动，并将其纳入推动商文旅融合发展的重点企业之一。

According to Mixue Group's interim performance report last year, the company's revenue in the first half of the year reached 14.87 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 39.3%; net profit was 2.72 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 44.1%, demonstrating continuous expansion capability. 根据蜜雪集团去年中期业绩报告，公司上半年收入达 148.7 亿元，同比增长 39.3%；净利润 27.2 亿元，同比增长 44.1%，展现出持续扩张能力。

item.title: 东鹏饮料港股上市募资近百亿港元
item.guid: 东鹏饮料港股上市募资近百亿港元
item.description:
According to Southern New Consumption, Eastroc Beverage officially listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange yesterday, with an offering price set at HK$248. Its opening market capitalization was approximately HK$110 billion, with net proceeds close to HK$10 billion, making it the largest IPO in Asia's consumer beverage industry since 2020. 据南方新消费报道，东鹏饮料昨天正式在港交所挂牌上市，发行价定为 248 港元，开盘市值约 1100 亿港元，募资净额接近 100 亿港元，成为 2020 年以来亚洲消费饮料行业规模最大的 IPO。

At the listing ceremony, singer Han Hong and company founder Lin Muqin jointly took the stage to strike the gong, becoming the focus of attention. Han Hong is the first brand ambassador for Eastroc's ready-to-drink coffee brand "Eastroc Daka," marking her first commercial endorsement in 30 years of her career. 上市仪式上，歌手韩红与公司创始人林木勤共同登台敲锣成为现场焦点。韩红是东鹏即饮咖啡品牌「东鹏大咖」的首位代言人，这也是她出道 30 年来的首个商业代言。

The collaboration between the two parties began with the "Hundred People Aid Ningxia" charity project in 2017, with years of cooperation laying the foundation for this endorsement. 双方合作始于 2017 年的公益项目「百人援宁」，多年合作为此次代言奠定基础。

Despite the attention generated by the celebrity endorsement, Eastroc Beverage's stock price briefly fell below its offering price after opening, then rebounded in the afternoon. As of yesterday's close, the stock price was HK$252 per share, up 1.61% from the offering price, with a total market capitalization of approximately HK$141.3 billion; its A-share price slightly dropped by 1.18% to 253.96 yuan per share. 尽管明星站台引发关注，东鹏饮料股价在开盘后短暂跌破发行价，午后回升。截至昨日收盘，股价报 252 港元/股，较发行价上涨 1.61%，总市值约 1413 亿港元；A 股方面则微跌 1.18% 至 253.96 元/股。

This IPO attracted a rare luxurious cornerstone investor lineup in the Hong Kong consumer sector, including 15 institutions such as Qatar Investment Authority, Temasek, J.P. Morgan Asset Management, UBS Asset Management, BlackRock, and Fidelity. 此次 IPO 引入了港股消费行业罕见的豪华基石阵容，包括卡塔尔投资局、淡马锡、摩根大通资产管理、瑞银资产管理、贝莱德、富达等 15 家机构。

Qatar Investment Authority led the investment with US$150 million, setting three "firsts" in its A/H-share IPO investment history. Cornerstone investors collectively subscribed for US$640 million, accounting for 49.2% of the fundraising size. 卡塔尔投资局以 1.5 亿美元领投，创下其在 A/H 股 IPO 投资史上的三项「首次」。基石投资者合计认购规模达 6.4 亿美元，占募资规模的 49.2%。

The prospectus shows that from 2022 to 2024, Eastroc Beverage's revenue grew from 8.5 billion yuan to 15.83 billion yuan, with a compound annual growth rate of 36.5%; during the same period, net profit increased from 1.441 billion yuan to 3.326 billion yuan, with a compound annual growth rate of 52.0%. 招股书显示，2022 年至 2024 年，东鹏饮料营收从 85 亿元增长至 158.30 亿元，年复合增长率达 36.5%；同期净利润从 14.41 亿元增长至 33.26 亿元，年复合增长率达 52.0%。

The company expects its net profit attributable to parent company to grow by 30.36% to 37.97% in 2025. 公司预计 2025 年归母净利润将同比增长 30.36% 至 37.97%。

According to the plan, the raised funds will be used to expand production lines, with approximately 12% invested in overseas market warehousing, supply chain construction, channel expansion, brand promotion, and potential investment mergers and acquisitions. Eastroc Beverage hopes to leverage the Hong Kong stock platform to promote internationalization and reduce its reliance on a single product. 根据规划，募资将用于扩建生产线，并将约 12% 投入海外市场仓储、供应链建设、渠道拓展、品牌推广及潜在投资并购。东鹏饮料希望借助港股平台推动国际化，减少对单一产品的依赖。

item.title: 智元将办全球首场机器人晚会《机器人奇妙夜》
item.guid: 智元将办全球首场机器人晚会《机器人奇妙夜》
item.description:
Yesterday, ZHIYUAN Robotics announced that it will host the world's first large-scale robot gala, "Robot Wonderful Night," at 8 PM on February 8th. 昨天，智元机器人宣布将于 2 月 8 日晚 8 点举办全球首个大型机器人晚会《机器人奇妙夜》。

The official statement indicates that this gala will feature hundreds of different types of robots performing together. The program will cover various performance types, including singing, dancing, skits, and fashion shows, aiming to showcase the comprehensive capabilities of embodied AI in performance, collaboration, and real-time control. 官方表示，这场晚会将由数百台不同类型的机器人共同出演，节目形式涵盖唱歌、跳舞、小品、走秀等多种表演类型，旨在展示具身智能在表演、协作与实时控制方面的综合能力。

Insiders revealed that ZHIYUAN Robotics will not participate in the traditional Year of the Horse Spring Festival Gala this year. With a limited budget, the company will prioritize resources towards the research and development of core embodied AI technologies and products to ensure the continuous advancement of key technological routes. 知情人士透露，智元机器人今年不会参与传统的马年春晚。公司在预算有限的情况下，将资源优先投入具身智能核心技术与产品研发，以确保关键技术路线的持续推进。

item.title: 《星河入梦》发布「无限重开」预告
item.guid: 《星河入梦》发布「无限重开」预告
item.description:
<Insert Video Account: China Film Distribution> <插入视频号：中影发行>

Yesterday, the film "Into the Starry River Dream" released its "Infinite Replay" version trailer, further showcasing its fantasy setting centered around a dream system. 昨天，影片《星河入梦》公布了「无限重开」版预告，进一步展示其以梦境系统为核心的奇幻设定。

In the trailer, characters played by Wang Hedi and Song Qian enter a Hong Kong-style fantasy setting through the virtual dream system "Liangmeng." Due to the system's mechanics, they are constantly "instantly killed" and re-enter the dream, starting a new round of challenges with random identities, thus enhancing the film's gamified narrative style. 预告中，王鹤棣与宋茜饰演的角色通过虚拟梦境系统「良梦」进入港风奇幻场景，并因系统机制不断「被秒」后重新入梦，以随机身份开启新一轮闯关，强化影片的游戏化叙事风格。

The tea restaurant dreamscape presented in the trailer features a green main tone, paired with highly saturated character styling, forming the "dream aesthetics" emphasized by the film. From visuals to narrative, the overall style is aimed at young audiences, positioning itself as a light and refreshing film with "0 preaching, 0 sentimentality, 0 worries." 预告呈现的茶餐厅梦境以绿色为主调，搭配高饱和度人物造型，构成影片强调的「梦境美学」。从视觉到叙事，整体风格均面向年轻观众，主打「0 说教、0 煽情、0 烦恼」的轻松爽片定位。

"Into the Starry River Dream" is directed by Han Yan. Set in the near future, people can "fulfill their dreams" in customized dreamscapes through the "Liangmeng" system. However, an ensuing crisis forces administrator Brother Biao and Captain Simeng to team up and traverse dreams to rescue those trapped within. 《星河入梦》由韩延执导，影片设定在近未来，人们可通过「良梦」系统在定制梦境中「圆梦」，但随之而来的危机迫使管理员彪哥与舰长思蒙联手穿梭梦境，拯救被困其中的人。

item.title: 张艺谋新片《惊蛰无声》发布角色海报
item.guid: 张艺谋新片《惊蛰无声》发布角色海报
item.description:
Yesterday, Zhang Yimou's new Spring Festival film "Jingzhe Wusheng" (Silent Awakening) released its "Hard to Distinguish" character posters. The film centers on contemporary national security, narrating the leak of classified information concerning China's latest fighter jets, with multiple lead actors presenting a tense spy warfare atmosphere through highly expressive facial close-ups. 昨天，张艺谋执导的春节档新片《惊蛰无声》发布「难辨」角色海报，影片以当代国家安全为核心主题，围绕我国最新战机涉密信息外泄展开叙事，多位主演以极具张力的面部特写呈现紧张的谍战氛围。

The posters use stark lighting and shadows to outline the characters' expressions, with subtle facial cues from Yi Yangqianxi, Zhu Yilong, Song Jia, Lei Jiayin, Yang Mi, Zhang Yi, Liu Shishi, Liu Yaowen, Lin Boyang, and other characters hinting at the plot's direction. 海报以冷冽光影勾勒人物神情，易烊千玺、朱一龙、宋佳、雷佳音、杨幂、张译、刘诗诗、刘耀文、林博洋等角色均以细微表情暗示剧情走向。

The film tells the story of a national security team that swiftly takes action after classified information is leaked, tracking down spies in a hidden battlefield where trust and betrayal intertwine. 影片讲述国安小组在涉密信息外泄后迅速展开行动，在信任与背叛交织的隐蔽战场中追查间谍。

"Jingzhe Wusheng" (Silent Awakening) is created under the guidance of the Ministry of State Security, directed by Zhang Yimou, and stars Yi Yangqianxi and Zhu Yilong. It is the first domestic film to focus on contemporary national security themes and will be released on Lunar New Year's Day (February 17th). 《惊蛰无声》由国家安全部指导创作，张艺谋执导，易烊千玺、朱一龙领衔主演，是国内首部聚焦当代国家安全题材的电影，将于大年初一（2 月 17 日）上映。
